did.unittitle: Chris Chafe Collection of Cannon Mills/Pillowtex Vote Count Materials, 1999- 1999
did.repository: Kheel Center for Labor-Management Documentation and Archives, Cornell University Library
did.abstract: Notes from a Cannon Mills/Pillowtex vote that took place at A. L. Brown High School in Kannapolis, North Carolina, on June 23, 1999.

scopecontent.p: This collection consists of notes from a Cannon Mills/Pillowtex vote that took place at A. L. Brown High School in Kannapolis, North Carolina, on June 23, 1999.

accessrestrict.p: Access to the collections in the Kheel Center is restricted. Please contact a reference archivist for access to these materials.

userestrict.p: This collection must be used in keeping with the Kheel Center Information Sheet and Procedures for Document Use.

prefercite.p: Chris Chafe Collection of Cannon Mills/Pillowtex Vote Count Materials #6109m. Kheel Center for Labor-Management Documentation and Archives, Cornell University Library.

scopecontent.p: Vote took place at A. L. Brown High School in Kannapolis, North Carolina; June 23, 1999.
